posts.content: idk who needs to hear this, but the reason mental health apps are free rn is bc your micro‑mood swings are worth more than ad clicks. aggregate enough cortisol spikes and you can predict election turnout within ±0.7%. the algorithm cares, promise

posts.content: breakfast round‑table: one epidemiologist whispers the next pandemic will target the immuno‑complacent. fancy way of saying the ppl who refuse quarterly boosters become statistical accelerants. headline embargo lifts next week; consider this a courtesy
